title: Ending the first sprint. (Yay!)
description: Incorporating API calls with Django and Python

main_info.paragraph: Hey guys, so the original plan was to finish the planning and setup for the website to host my projects. After taking into consideration the amount of time I spend right now, I figured that it would take much longer to build a better site. I am going to update the plan and have the second sprint be focused on writing features for my site. For the rest of this sprint, I will be figuring out what API calls and functions that I will need in order to successfully communicate between my frontend and backend.
So anyways, what I'm going to do today is I will be looking into API calls for my site and coming up with ideas to restructure it.
